name: Pora Ora - learning should be fun
blurb: Pora Ora is a 3D virtual world designed to make learning fun.

rewards.reward: No Reward
Not only will you have our eternal gratitude, but a heartfelt appreciation from a whole generation of children who are going to have fun learning.

You will receive a Pora Ora starter pack. This means that when you create your FREE account on Pora Ora, you'll be given a few cheeky extras. Now we want you to earn some roobles through knowledge and effort but with 5000 roobles in the bank, you can make sure your Pora Pad is decked out.
Get your coloring pencils, crayons, felt tips and glitter at the ready; you get a Pora Ora coloring book pdf packed with lots of Pora Ora illustrations to jazz up! - Includes $10 pledge.

You will be able to put your coloring, math and literacy skills to the test with a Pora Ora coloring book pdf, and Pora Ora math and literacy workbook pdf. Our workbooks are fun, creative and full of educational goodies. Choose an age range that is best for your child, 5-7, 7-9 or 9-11. years old. Includes previous pledges.
You'll get all of the above and premium access to Pora Ora for a year! Premium membership means you will have access to all the worlds, Pora Pals and more when they are released.
You will get two in-game items in Pora Ora exclusive to backers of this Kickstarter, plus all previous pledges.

You'll get all of the above mentioned and free access to our Pora Pal app which will allow your child to play and interact with their Pora Pals on the go. You will also be able to download our parent portal app allowing you to see just how much your child progresses on the go.

You'll get everything mentioned above plus a digital version of the \u201cMaking of Pora Ora\u2019 book. This book will trace the history of Pora Ora and contains original concept art, game design documentation, plus interviews with the team. You will also get VIP access to a special "founders" area on the development forums.

You'll get all of the above plus a fabulous limited edition Pora Ora T-shirt designed exclusively by the Pora Ora concept artists (available in a range of sizes/colours) + your name will be added to the game's credits!

You'll get all of the above and get pre-release access to new worlds. Discover new quests, games, characters and features before it goes live! You can explore all that Pora Ora has to offer before the crowds get in.

Not only will you get all of the above, but also some pretty awesome high quality print Pora Ora concept artwork, signed by our design team and sealed and delivered to your door. We'll also throw in a random surprise!

You get life premium membership! It will of course be equipped with pre-release access to all the new features. You'll never have to pay a penny to open a new world and you are guaranteed exclusive access to any new features for years to come! To top it all off, you'll get hard copies of our workbooks and coloring books.

Get all of the above and transform the learning experience of 10 lucky kids with premium membership for a year. You'll also get to have a personal Q & A Skype call with us. So whether you want to find out more, or know someone who would love some advice on game development, we'd be more than happy to share our tips.
You'll get all of the above, plus a portrait of you in Pora Ora. We promise to make sure we capture your 'good side'. If this doesn't appeal then why not bestow the honor on a beloved pet instead?

You get all of the above but instead of a portrait you get to have your very own statue! Pora Ora players will gather around your greatness. We will also create a personalized "thank you" video made specifically for YOU with some exclusive behind-the-scenes content and posted unlisted on YouTube then e-mailed to you!

Alongside having your very own statue, you can select 30 lucky kids to have premium access for life! That's right - for life. Great for birthday presents or as amazing party/goody bag fillers. You'll get all the reward tiers up to $750 included.

Instead of a statue you can design your very own Pora Pal! You will get the opportunity to work exclusively with our design team to put your imagination into action. You'll get all the rewards up to $750 included!
Along with the $7500 pledge you'll have, for one week,  the use of the amazing house on Arranmore Island, Ireland, birthplace of Pora Ora.

Become a villain or hero! You get to star  in a quest designed by you. Be the baddest or the greatest; you decide! You and a guest will also spend the day with us at at Caped Koala Studios and discuss the finer aspects of  Pora Ora after which, you can pose for pictures, pick up exclusive swag and ultimately join us for an evening to remember at the legendary Silicon sessions.
